title: 2bd 2ba, 9-foot ceilings, Separate dining area!
posting_body: Resort-style living gets a new meaning at Village on Main Apartments – located on the Point Ruston waterfront in Tacoma.
Enjoy a truly modern urban village experience with countless dining, shopping, and recreation options right outside your doorstep.
Not to mention the coveted amenities and unequaled interiors available to residents right within the community.
-50 onsite retail with unique eateries and shopping right at your doorstep
-Private parking garage with direct access elevators                                                                                         Featured amenity

-Stainless steel appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity
-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements
